H0.text: Which team beat American Samoa 31-0 in a qualifying match for the 2002 World Cup, but still failed to qualify. Australia

H1.text: Which team beat American Samoa 31-0 in a qualifying match for the 2002 World Cup, but still failed to qualify. New Zealand
